stories.title: Some one just got hacked
stories.detail: In June two separate South Korean exchanges suffered attacks. Coinrail lost about 5300 BTC or $40 million, apparently taken from hot wallets. Weeks later, Bithumb — one of the ten largest crypto exchanges — lost $31 million in another hot wallet raid.
